name: Color Machine Free
description:
••• Get the Full version of "Color Mixing" for Free! •••

Control your drop of paint with the accelerometer, use the color machines and get the right combination to fill the buckets and go to the next level.
If the color combination is wrong, go to in the "Wash Machine" to clean your drop of paint.
This application allows you to develop your visual precision and your reflexes while learning the primary colors combinations.
Learn and develop your senses while having fun.
Be careful, the difficulty always increases.
Speed, vigilance and precision are your allies.
The High Score and the Last Score are recorded.

Game Features:
• Learning is fun
• Expand your reflexes and your visual precision
• High control precision with the accelerometer
• High graphics and animations quality
• Unique GamePlay experience
• Very addictive
